div.div: Univ. of St. Thomas vs. Augsburg College
at Minneapolis, Minn. | Edor Nelson Field

tr.td: Augsburg wins toss, defers, St. Thomas receive & defend east end.
Tyler Hanson kickoff 55 yards to the UST-MEN10, Nick Waldvogel return 21 yards to the UST-MEN31 (Cyrus Elliott; Nahjai Brown).
Univ. of St. Thomas drive start at 15:00.
Jordan Roberts rush for 1 yard to the UST-MEN32 (Tyler Sis; B.Williams).
